response.original_title: ゲーメスト ビデオ VOL.1 ファイナルファイト
response.overview: Game Master Video Vol. 1: Final Fight  Color / 60 min / Stereo / July 12, 1991  Shinseisha GV-001  The super-long, smash hit "Final Fight" is finally available on video!  The first Game Master original video!!  1990's #1 Best Game of the Year  4th Game Master Award Grand Prize Winner  Capcom CP System 7th Edition  Final Fight, which continues to reign as the pinnacle of fighting games in arcades, has been fully remastered with all its intensity and fun! Packed with everything from the legendary Mayor Haggar's perfect one-coin clear, to Guy Cody's two-player super techniques, "Who's to go this far?" (Golden) moves, and hilarious moves, this is a must-see for F.F. fans nationwide!!  Players: GOT, Zenji Ishii, C.LAN, Charako Endo  Director: Zenji Ishii (Monthly Game Master Editor-in-Chief)
response.title: GAMEST VIDEO VOL.1 - FINAL FIGHT
